help.audioPatch: Opens the Audio Interface and Patching Window.
help.algorithm: Select the rendering algorithm from the menu.
help.processing: Lock all I/O parameters and start the DSP. Long press to stop the DSP.
help.soloMode: Single: one input at a time. Multi: multiple inputs simultaneously.
help.stageShape: Select the shape of the stage (Box, Cylinder, or Dome).
help.stageWidth: Width of the stage in meters (Box shape only).
help.stageDepth: Depth of the stage in meters (Box shape only).
help.stageHeight: Height of the stage in meters (Box and Cylinder shapes).
help.stageDiameter: Diameter of the stage in meters (Cylinder and Dome shapes).
help.domeElevation: Dome elevation angle: 180 = hemisphere, 360 = full sphere.
help.originWidth: Origin X offset from stage center (0 = centered, negative = left).
help.originDepth: Origin Y offset from stage center (0 = centered, negative = front/downstage).
help.originHeight: Origin Z offset from floor (0 = floor level, positive = above floor).
help.originFront: Set origin to front center of stage. Typical for frontal stages.
help.originCenterGround: Set origin to center of stage at ground level. Typical for Surround or Cylindrical setups.
help.originCenter: Set origin to center of stage volume. Typical for Spherical Dome setups.
help.speedOfSound: Speed of Sound (related to the temperature).
help.systemLatency: Total latency of the system (Mixing board & Computer) / Specific Input and Output Latency/Delay can be set in the respective Input and Output settings.
help.haasEffect: Hass Effect to apply to the system. Will take into account the Latency Compensations (System, Input and Output).
help.colorScheme: Select the color scheme: Default (dark gray), Black (pure black for OLED displays), or Light (daytime use).
help.screenReader: Enable or disable screen reader announcements. When enabled, parameter names and values are announced on hover, and help text is read after a few seconds.
help.selectProjectFolder: Select the Location of the Current Project Folder where to store files.
help.storeComplete: Store Complete Configuration to files (with backup).
help.reloadCompleteBackup: Reload Complete Configuration from backup files.
help.storeSystem: Store System Configuration to file (with backup).
help.reloadSystemBackup: Reload System Configuration from backup file.
help.importSystem: Import System Configuration from file (with file explorer window).
help.exportSystem: Export System Configuration to file (with file explorer window).
help.language: Select the user interface language. Changes take full effect after restarting the application.
help.binauralEnable: Enable or disable the binaural renderer processing.
help.binauralOutput: Select output channel pair for binaural monitoring. Off disables binaural output.
help.binauralDistance: Distance of binaural listener from stage origin (meters).
help.binauralAngle: Horizontal rotation of binaural listener view (degrees, 0 = facing stage).
help.binauralAtten: Overall level offset for binaural output (dB).

messages.selectFolderFirst: Please select a project folder first.
messages.languageChanged: Language changed to: {language} (requires restart for full effect)

reduceInputChannels.title: Reduce Input Channels?
reduceInputChannels.message:
Reducing from {current} to {new} input channels will remove settings for channels {start} to {end}.

This cannot be undone.

reduceOutputChannels.title: Reduce Output Channels?
reduceOutputChannels.message:
Reducing from {current} to {new} output channels will remove settings for channels {start} to {end}.

This cannot be undone.

reduceReverbChannels.title: Reduce Reverb Channels?
reduceReverbChannels.message:
Reducing from {current} to {new} reverb channels will remove settings for channels {start} to {end}.

This cannot be undone.

help.udpPort: UDP Receive Port of the Processor.
help.tcpPort: TCP Receive Port of the Processor.
help.oscQueryPort: HTTP port for OSC Query discovery. Other apps can browse parameters at http://localhost:<port>/
help.oscQueryEnable: Enable/disable OSC Query server for automatic parameter discovery via HTTP/WebSocket.
help.dataMode: Select UDP or TCP data transmission.
help.targetIP: IP Address of the Target (use 127.0.0.1 for local host).
help.protocol: Select the Protocol: DISABLED, OSC, REMOTE, or ADM-OSC.
help.findMyRemote: Make your Remote Flash and Buzz to Find it.
help.oscSourceFilter: Filter incoming OSC: Accept All sources or only Registered connections with Rx enabled.
help.admOscFlipX: Invert Axis of ADM-OSC X Coordinate.
help.admOscFlipY: Invert Axis of ADM-OSC Y Coordinate.
help.admOscFlipZ: Invert Axis of ADM-OSC Z Coordinate.
help.trackingEnabled: Enable or Disable Incoming Tracking data processing.
help.trackingProtocol: Select the type of Tracking Protocol.
help.trackingPort: Specify the Port to receive Tracking data.
help.trackingFlipX: Invert Axis of Tracking X Coordinate.
help.trackingFlipY: Invert Axis of Tracking Y Coordinate.
help.trackingFlipZ: Invert Axis of Tracking Z Coordinate.
help.trackingOscPath: OSC Path for the Tracking in OSC Mode (starts with a /)
help.psnInterface: Network interface for PSN multicast reception
help.reloadBackup: Reload Network Configuration from backup file.

dialogs.findMyRemoteMessage: Enter the password for your remote device:
dialogs.trackingConflictsMessage: Only one tracked input per cluster is allowed. If you continue, tracking will be kept only for the first input in each cluster.

messages.selectFolderFirst: Please select a project folder in System Config first.
messages.onlyOneRemote: Only one REMOTE connection is allowed.

dialogs.unpatchInputsMessage: Are you sure you want to remove all input patches?
dialogs.unpatchOutputsMessage: Are you sure you want to remove all output patches?

messages.chooseTestSignal: Choose a Test Signal to Enable Testing

tooltips.fitStage: Adjust the zoom and panning to fit the stage on the display
tooltips.fitInputs: Adjust the zoom and panning to fit all visible inputs on the display
tooltips.levels: Display the levels for inputs and outputs on the map

tooltips.solo: Display the contribution of the input to all outputs in the Level Meter display (in Single mode) and play binaural render of soloed inputs
tooltips.soloMode: Single: one input at a time. Multi: multiple inputs simultaneously.

messages.selectFolderFirst: Please select a project folder in System Config first.

help.arraySelector: Selected Output Channel is part of Array.
help.applyToArray: Apply Changes to the rest of the Array (Absolute value or Relative changes).
help.attenuation: Output Channel Attenuation. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.delayLatency: Output Channel Delay (positive values) or Latency Compensation (negative values). (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.minLatency: Disables Minimal Latency Mode for Selected Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.liveSource: Disables Live Source Attenuation for Selected Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.floorReflections: Enable or Disable the Floor Reflections for this Speaker.
help.distanceAtten: Ratio of Distance Attenuation for Selected Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.hParallax: Horizontal Distance from Speaker to 'Targeted' Listener. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.vParallax: Vertical Distance from Speaker to 'Targeted' Listener. Positive when the Speaker is Below the head of the Listener. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.coordMode: Coordinate display mode: Cartesian (X/Y/Z), Cylindrical (radius/azimuth/height), or Spherical (radius/azimuth/elevation).
help.directional: Output Channel Directional Control. Drag to change orientation, Shift+drag for Angle Off, Alt+drag for Angle On. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.angleOn: Output Channel Will Amplify Objects in this Angle in its Back. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.angleOff: Output Channel Will Not Amplify Objects in this Angle in Front of it. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.pitch: Output Channel Vertical Orientation used to Determine which Objects get amplified. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.hfDamping: Loss of High Frequency Depending on Distance from Object to Output. (changes may affect the rest of the array)
help.wizardOfOutZ: Open Wizard of OutZ to Position Speaker Arrays Conveniently.
help.mapVisibility: Make Visible or Hide The Selected Output on the Map.
help.storeConfig: Store Output Configuration to file (with backup).
help.reloadBackup: Reload Output Configuration from backup file.
help.importConfig: Import Output Configuration from file (with file explorer window).
help.exportConfig: Export Output Configuration to file (with file explorer window).

status.applied: Applied {count} speakers to Array {array}. Ready for next array.

errors.speakerCountZero: Number of speakers must be greater than 0
errors.noPositions: No positions to apply. Check geometry parameters.
errors.notEnoughOutputs: Not enough output channels! Need {count} starting from {start}

reverbs.noChannels:
No reverb channels configured.

Set the number of Reverb Channels in System Config.

messages.selectFolderFirst: Please select a project folder in System Config first.

help.mapVisibility: Make Visible or Hide All Reverb Channels on the Map.
help.angleOn: Angle at which amplification starts (1-180 degrees).
help.angleOff: Angle at which no amplification occurs (0-179 degrees).
help.pitch: Vertical orientation of reverb (-90 to +90 degrees).
help.hfDamping: High frequency loss per meter (-6.0 to 0.0 dB/m).
help.coordMode: Coordinate display mode: Cartesian (X/Y/Z), Cylindrical (radius/azimuth/height), or Spherical (radius/azimuth/elevation).
help.eqEnable: Enable or disable EQ processing for this reverb.
help.distanceAtten: Distance attenuation for reverb return (-6.0 to 0.0 dB/m).
help.muteMacros: Quick mute operations for output channels.
help.storeConfig: Store Reverb Configuration to file (with backup).
help.reloadBackup: Reload Reverb Configuration from backup file.
help.importConfig: Import Reverb Configuration from file (with file explorer window).
help.exportConfig: Export Reverb Configuration to file (with file explorer window).
help.algoSDN: Select SDN (Scattering Delay Network) reverb algorithm.
help.algoFDN: Select FDN (Feedback Delay Network) reverb algorithm.
help.algoIR: Select IR (Impulse Response convolution) reverb algorithm.
help.algoCrossoverLow: Low crossover frequency for 3-band decay (50 - 500 Hz).
help.algoCrossoverHigh: High crossover frequency for 3-band decay (1 - 10 kHz).
help.algoIRFile: Select or import an impulse response file for convolution.
help.algoIRTrim: Trim the start of the impulse response (0 - 100 ms).
help.algoPerNode: Use a separate IR for each reverb node, or share one IR.
help.algoWetLevel: Wet/dry mix level for reverb output (-60 to +12 dB).
help.preCompBypass: Bypass or enable the pre-compressor on reverb feeds.
help.postExpBypass: Bypass or enable the post-expander on reverb returns.
help.miniLatencyTooltip: Enable minimal latency mode for this reverb channel. Reduces processing delay at the cost of higher CPU usage.
help.liveSourceTooltip: Enable Live Source attenuation tamer. Reduces level fluctuations from sources close to the array.

dialogs.storeSnapshotMessage: Enter a name for the new snapshot:
dialogs.trackingConflictCluster:
Input {current} has tracking enabled, but Input {existing} in Cluster {cluster} is already tracked.

Only one tracked input per cluster is allowed.
dialogs.trackingConflictSwitch:
Input {existing} in Cluster {cluster} already has tracking enabled.

Only one tracked input per cluster is allowed.

Do you want to disable tracking on Input {existing} and enable it on Input {to}?

messages.selectFolderFirst: Please select a project folder in System Config first.
messages.trackingSwitched: Tracking switched from Input {from} to Input {to}

help.solo: Listen to Binaural Rendering of this channel.
help.soloMode: Single: one input at a time. Multi: multiple inputs simultaneously.
help.storeConfig: Store Input Configuration to file (with backup).
help.reloadBackup: Reload Input Configuration from backup file.
help.importConfig: Import Input Configuration from file (with file explorer window).
help.exportConfig: Export Input Configuration to file (with file explorer window).
help.storeSnapshot: Store new Input Snapshot for All Objects.
help.reloadSnapshot: Reload Selected Input Snapshot for All Objects Taking the Scope into Account.
help.reloadWithoutScope: Reload Selected Input Snapshot for All Objects Without the Scope.
help.editScope: Open Selected Input Snapshot Scope Window.
help.deleteSnapshot: Delete Selected Input Snapshot With Confirmation.
help.clusterSelector: Object is Part of a Cluster.
help.mapLockButton: Prevent Interaction on the Map Tab
help.mapVisibilityButton: Make Visible or Hide The Selected Input on the Map
help.delayLatencySlider: Input Channel Delay (positive values) or Latency Compensation (negative values).
help.minimalLatencyButton: Select between Acoustic Precedence and Minimal Latency for Amplification Precedence.
help.posXEditor: Object Position in Width. Nudge with Left and Right Arrow Keys.
help.posYEditor: Object Position in Depth. Nudge with Up and Down Arrow Keys.
help.posZEditor: Object Position in Height. Nudge with Page Up and Page Down Keys.
help.offsetXEditor: Object Position Offset in Width. Adjusted when Tracking is Enabled.
help.offsetYEditor: Object Position Offset in Depth. Adjusted when Tracking is Enabled.
help.offsetZEditor: Object Position Offset in Height. Adjusted when Tracking is Enabled.
help.constraintXButton: Limit Position to the Bounds of the Stage in Width.
help.constraintYButton: Limit Position to the Bounds of the Stage in Depth.
help.constraintZButton: Limit Position to the Bounds of the Stage in Height.
help.constraintDistanceButton: Limit Position to Distance Range from Origin (for Cylindrical/Spherical modes).
help.distanceRangeSlider: Set Minimum and Maximum Distance from Origin.
help.distanceMinEditor: Minimum Distance from Origin in Meters.
help.distanceMaxEditor: Maximum Distance from Origin in Meters.
help.flipXButton: X will be Symetrical to the Origin. Keyboard Nudging will be Inverted.
help.flipYButton: Y will be Symetrical to the Origin. Keyboard Nudging will be Inverted.
help.flipZButton: Z will be Symetrical to the Origin. Keyboard Nudging will be Inverted.
help.trackingActiveButton: Enable or Disable Tracking for Object.
help.trackingSmoothDial: Smoothing of Tracking Data for Object.
help.maxSpeedActiveButton: Enable or Disable Speed Limiting for Object.
help.pathModeButton: Enable Path Mode to Follow Drawn Movement Paths Instead of Direct Lines.
help.heightFactorDial: Take Elevation of Object into Account Fully, Partially or Not.
help.coordModeSelector: Coordinate display mode: Cartesian (X/Y/Z), Cylindrical (radius/azimuth/height), or Spherical (radius/azimuth/elevation).
help.positionJoystick: Drag to adjust X/Y position in real-time. Returns to center on release.
help.positionZSlider: Drag to adjust Z (height) position in real-time. Returns to center on release.
help.attenuationLawButton: Attenuation Law Model (Linear Decrease of Volume with Distance Between Object and Speaker or Squared).
help.distanceAttenDial: Attenuation per Meter Between Object and Speaker.
help.commonAttenDial: Percentage of the Common Part of the Attenuation for selected Object Relative to All Outputs.
help.directivitySlider: How Wide is the Brightness of The Object.
help.inputDirectivityDial: Where is the Object pointing to in the Horizontal Plane.
help.tiltSlider: Where is the Object pointing to in the Vertical Plane.
help.hfShelfSlider: How Much Brightness is lost in the Back of the Object, Out of its Brightness Cone.
help.lsActiveButton: If You Need to Reduce the Level in Speakers Close to the Object. (eg. Loud Source Present on Stage)
help.lsRadiusSlider: How Far does the Attenuation Affect The Speakers.
help.lsShapeSelector: Profile of the Attenuation Around the Object.
help.lsAttenuationSlider: Constant Attenuation of Speakers Around the Object.
help.lsPeakThresholdSlider: Fast Compression Threshold for Speakers Around the Object to Control Transients.
help.lsPeakRatioDial: Ratio to Apply the Fast Compression for Speakers Around the Object.
help.lsSlowThresholdSlider: Slow Compression Threshold for Speakers Around the Object to Control Sustained Level.
help.lsSlowRatioDial: Ratio to Apply the Slow Compression for Speakers Around the Object.
help.frActiveButton: Enable Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.
help.frAttenuationSlider: Attenuation of the Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.
help.frDiffusionDial: Diffusion Effect of the Simulated Floor Reflections for the Object.
help.frLowCutActiveButton: Enable Low Cut Filter for Floor Reflections.
help.frLowCutFreqSlider: Low Cut Frequency for Floor Reflections.
help.frHighShelfActiveButton: Enable High Shelf Filter for Floor Reflections.
help.frHighShelfFreqSlider: High Shelf Frequency for Floor Reflections.
help.frHighShelfGainSlider: High Shelf Gain for Floor Reflections.
help.frHighShelfSlopeSlider: High Shelf Slope for Floor Reflections.
help.muteReverbSendsButton: Mute sends from this input to all reverb channels.
help.jitterSlider: Sphere of Rapid Movements of the Object.
help.lfoActiveButton: Enable or Disable the Periodic Movement of the Object (LFO).
help.lfoPeriodDial: Base Period of the Movement of the Object.
help.lfoPhaseDial: Phase Offset of the Movement of the Object.
help.lfoShapeXSelector: Movement Behaviour of the Object in Width.
help.lfoShapeYSelector: Movement Behaviour of the Object in Depth.
help.lfoShapeZSelector: Movement Behaviour of the Object in Height.
help.lfoRateXSlider: Faster or Slower Movement in Relation to Base Period in Width.
help.lfoRateYSlider: Faster or Slower Movement in Relation to Base Period in Depth.
help.lfoRateZSlider: Faster or Slower Movement in Relation to Base Period in Height.
help.lfoAmplitudeXSlider: Width of Movement in Relation to Base Position of the Object.
help.lfoAmplitudeYSlider: Depth of Movement in Relation to Base Position of the Object.
help.lfoAmplitudeZSlider: Height of Movement in Relation to Base Position of the Object.
help.lfoPhaseXDial: Phase Offset of the Movement of the Object in Width.
help.lfoPhaseYDial: Phase Offset of the Movement of the Object in Depth.
help.lfoPhaseZDial: Phase Offset of the Movement of the Object in Height.
help.lfoGyrophoneSelector: Rotation of the Brightness Cone of the Object.
help.otomoAbsRelButton: Select Relative or Absolute Coordinates of Displacement.
help.otomoStayReturnButton: At the End of the Movement, should the Source Stay or Return to the Original Position.
help.otomoSpeedProfileDial: Constant Speed or Gradual Acceleration and Slow Down at the Start and the End of the Movement.
help.otomoTriggerButton: Manual Start of Displacement or Automatic Trigger on the Audio Level.
help.otomoThresholdDial: Set the Threshold for the Automatic Trigger of the Movement.
help.otomoResetDial: Set the Reset Level for the Automatic Trigger.
help.otomoDurationDial: Duration of the Movement in Seconds (0.1s to 1 hour).
help.otomoCurveDial: Bend the Path to the Left (Negative) or Right (Positive) of the Direction of Travel.
help.otomoPauseResumeAllButton: Pause or Resume All Active Movements Globally.
help.muteMacrosSelector: Mute Macros for Fast Muting and Unmuting of Arrays.
help.sidelinesActiveButton: Enable Automatic Muting when Source Approaches Stage Edges. Does Not Apply to Downstage (Front) Edge.
help.sidelinesFringeDial: Fringe Zone Size in Meters. Outer Half is Full Mute, Inner Half Fades Linearly.

setAllInputs.warning: Changes will apply to ALL inputs

errors.noSystemDataInFile: No valid system data found in file: {path}
errors.noNetworkDataInFile: No network data found in file
errors.noNetworkSections: No network sections found in file
errors.noInputDataInFile: No input data found in file
errors.noOutputDataInFile: No output data found in file
errors.noReverbDataInFile: No reverb data found in file
errors.failedCreateXML: Failed to create XML from state
errors.failedCreateValueTree: Failed to create ValueTree from XML: {path}
